attributes.action: Allow the Car Industry to fail to force a major rethink and investment in public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Real investment in mass-transit (trains & buses) will reduce road use, reduce transport costs and dramatically increase disposable income for most people.

Allowing the Car Industry to fail will force this shift-change in public transport, reduce our reliance on oil and improve our environment.
